17.ara-name: كتاب الحدود عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdur-Rahman bin Muhariz said:"I asked Fadalah bin 'Ubaid about hanging the hand around the neck of the thief: 'Is this from the Sunnah?' He said: 'A man came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) with a thief so his hand was cut off, and then he ordered that it be hung around his neck

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي تَعْلِيقِ يَدِ السَّارِقِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Hanging The Hand Of The Thief (Around His Neck)
